Plot: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.
Title: Meet Dave
Actors: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union, Scott Caan
tomatoConsensus: Easy gags and slack direction drag this occasionally clever alien-out-of-planet comedy down to unimaginative lows.
